casebody.data:
Somers, Respondent, v. Metropolitan El. Ry. Co. et al., Appellants. (Superior Court of New York City, General Term. April 16, 1891.) Appeal from special term. Action by Peter Somers against the Metropolitan Elevated Railway Company and another. From a judgment for plaintiff, defendants appeal.

Argued before Sedgwick, C. J., and Dugro, J.

Julien T. Davies and Alexander S. Lyman, for appellants. Charles Gibson Bennett, for respondent. Per Curiam.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
